sect2.title: Installing Findutils
sect2.para: A patch must be applied in order to prevent compilation errors. The patch fixes a variable conflict and some bad syntax:
The locate program from Findutils may segfault if it encounters a long path name. To correct this, apply the second patch:

By default, the location of the updatedb database is in /usr/var. To make the location of /var/lib/misc/locatedb file FHS compliant, pass the localstatedir=/var/lib/misc option to both make commands below.
